name: Space Pielots
description:
You are a Pielot!

As a Pielot, you must prepare pies according to what the client ordered. Process randomly generated ingredients in alien machines in order to accurately delivery a pie that fits the customer desire.

  • Process randomly generated ingredients in alien machines to adjust their attributes
  • Pilot a spaceship to avoid being hit by meteors
  • If the timer runs out or your spaceship gets hit, you lose
  • Deliver a pie to win, but be prepared to see the customer's review
